summary: Thepla brand marketing/e-commerce-style website within the existing ICP dapp scaffold, with editable branding (logo/name), richer storytelling sections, categorized product sliders with realistic images and ₹ pricing, Women Udyog content, and expanded navigation/contact pages.
architectural_notes: Project structured as an ICP dapp with separate backend (Motoko canister) and frontend (React/Vite) plus generated Candid bindings.
Frontend stack: React + Vite + Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui component set; reusable UI primitives live under build-template/src/frontend/src/components/ui.
Authentication uses Internet Identity via a dedicated hook and actor-creation hook for backend calls.
Static product catalog is currently sourced from frontend code (data/products.ts); cart state is client-side and persisted via a storage utility.
Build-template includes Docker/deploy scaffolding and scripts for generated image resizing/pruning.
"Other Products" customization marquee should be placed below the "Other Products" heading, with increased size, darker color, and slower scroll speed to ensure visibility in the draft.
"Other Products" customization marquee text color should remain white (do not change to grey); adjust visibility via placement/size/speed/contrast in other ways.
Branding (logo + brand name) should be editable/configurable via a single source of truth (config or CMS-like constants) rather than hardcoded into components.
known_issues: The "Other Products" scrolling marquee text ("Quantity can be customized") was reported as not visible in the draft; likely styling/contrast/placement needs adjustment.
User requested the "Other Products" marquee text stay white (not grey); current draft/build may be changing it to grey.

Marquee requirement conflict: prior direction says "Quantity can be customized" marquee text must remain white; latest request asks for a darker moving line under Other products—needs clarification/alignment.
